title: Path Finder
description: A visualization of the search path, including shortest path, through a customizable maze. The visualizer showcases the logic of A*, Dijskstra, BFS, and DFS searches.

title: Drone Simulation
description: A simulation of a drone delivery system on the UMN Campus, incorporating realistic aspects such as package theft and drone battery management.

title: Face Mask Detector
description: Identifies if the subject in a picture is wearing a mask correctly or wearing a mask at all. Achieved 99% accuracy in predictions.

title: Spotify Playlists Generator
description: Generates a recommended playlist by inputting your favorite song or artist and uses Spotify's API to add the playlist directly to your account.

title: Sudoku Solver
description: An app for playing Sudoku that also solves puzzles for you if needed. It employs backtracking to solve the puzzles and visualizes each step of the process.
